section.title: Add Mapping Query Files
section.para: Query Manager can add Query mapping file to manage Query ID through Property setting. Only the IDs in added xml file are shown in Query Explorer View which will be covered later.
In addition, it is possible to set whether Query ID is used or duplicated, and also whether or not to leave a note on the Query information when creating Query ID.
There are two ways of adding xml file. One is finding the path of the project, the other selecting XML file that can be a target for destination.

section.title: Add
section.para: Shows Query mapping xml files including Query ID in tree type.

section.title: Scan
section.para: Shows Query mapping xml files including Query ID for selection.
